Firstable: thanks for the upload.
However, this is NOT the Director's cut! I realized it when I got problems to download the proper subtitles (the french ones); and the only ones that match your version are the subs for the normal version.
Anyway, it's a good thing  that your version is the normal one; since all movies with director's cut I watched so far suck! (if some scenes have been cut,, it's definitely for some reasons...)

V: 7/10
A: 5/10

Sound is choppy, and has clicking/popping/cracking in it. Very annoying. Also, the video didn't look much like 720p.
Hey, thanks a lot. I was looking for this, the original, not-director's cut, because that one sucks.
Quality is close to DVD, audio is bit tinny and muffled

I HIGHLY RECCOMEND NOT DOWNLOADING THIS, I did initially because it looks to be the only active torrent of the theatrical version in HD, however people who are looking for an HD version of the film I sure will be quite unhappy with the audio. It sounds like it was recorded from the inside of a movie theater and slapped on the video file, very muffly sounding. Raj I've used a lot of your stuff in the past but can't approve this one -sorry.
